to lose/to put aside/to throw
clown/2nd earthly branch: 1-3 a.m., 12th solar month (6th January to 3rd February), year of the Ox/ancient Chinese compass point: 30°

sentences.english: Pretending to understand what you actually did not may just bring yourself embarrassment or even disgrace.
sentences.chinese: 没有听懂而假装听懂，可能会让你尴尬甚至丢丑。

sentences.english: His conduct has brought reproach upon him.
A shame to let a joker like this win.
sentences.chinese: 让这么一个窝囊废赢了真丢丑。

sentences.english: I won't embarrass you in front of your friends.
sentences.chinese: 偶不会在你的朋友面前使你丢丑。
